posts.post_content:
Evening Gents,

I have this T206 Sherry Magie available.  Of the "Big 4" it was the only one still attainable for a plebe like me, especially in light of a Wagner now selling for $3M+.

Graded AUTH, but it presents much nicer than most 1s/AUTHs that look like they've passed through a dog's GI tract.

$9000 postpaid in the conus via USPS Registered Mail.  Payment must be through personal/bank check or ppff from established members only.  A commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing discussions, especially from established members.  I can provide a mountain of references from my 15 year history here on net54 and a history with every auction house under the sun.

Please send me a PM with interest.  

Thank you.

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
